page.title: 04NEW HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: Fernlea-new Housing estate recently developed . They are low density houses fairly large 4 bedrooms mainly detached with two garges . Houses have downstairs cloakroom .Each have a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Houses are built by Combens,now taken over by Ideal Homes . Some houses back on open hay fields farmed by Mr. Chamley. Family life,Fernlea,Braiswick.House wife she lives in Fernlea children Ashley 10,Elliot 8 educated at Private School .Husband company director in Brentwood.Gets home from work 7:45p.m.Own 2T.V's,1 tumbledrier, 1 video1 dishwasher 2 cars,1 freezer. Lived there 10mths. since new.Garden is 1fifth acre.pets = 7fish, 1boxer dog.wife buys groceries at Sainsburys Marks and Spencers.
